713030.name: Mini Hockey Champ!
713030.description:
Step back in time and take on the world's most infamous teams and players in a unique, no-holds-barred love letter to hockey. Mini Hockey Champ! brings all the best parts of the sport and laser focuses them into an easy to pickup, high energy experience. Hockey rookie or grizzled veteran, you'll quickly discover new and exciting ways to crush your opponents with board rattling hits, blueline clappers, and filthy spin-o-ramas!

Games are quick and furious, perfect for passing the controllers among friends on the couch, or battling the CPU on your own. The competition is stiff, so make sure you pick the right team if you want a shot at bringing the cup home. Mini Hockey Champ! features a full championship mode with high scores, rankings, and in-depth stat tracking so there's always something to work towards beyond the wins and losses. And when you're in the mood for something wild, try out some fun game options like flaming pucks, neon lights, giant heads, and more!

FEATURES

  • Championship Mode - Battle through 4 increasingly challenging rounds to hoist the cup
  • Action Packed - One-timers, dekes, goalie assists, cheap shots, taunting, and fighting
  • Fun For All - Simplified controls with a high ceiling for skill and experimentation
  • Promotional Nights - Belligerent crowds, neon soaked rinks, giant heads, fireball pucks
  • Titles - Play well, earn PUX, and be recognized as an all-time great
  • Stats & Records - Records are made to be broken, can you take down the legends?
  • Local Multiplayer - Grab a second controller and slam your 'friends' into the boards
  • Four Difficulties - Easy, Balanced, Hard, and 'The Computer Cheats'
  • Custom Rosters - Load externally edited roster files (.CSV) and play your own creations

Developer Note:
Mini Hockey Champ! was originally launched in 2017 and lived a pretty quiet life here. In 2023 the game received a complete overhaul, with improved gameplay, graphics, code, and a host of changes that hopefully make for a much better experience. While I'm calling this a re-master, I decided to release it as an update to the existing game because these changes better represent my original vision for MHC.
